summary: Provides a commandâ€‘line utility that reads a sim_telarray configuration file, extracts all telescope model parameters, validates them against predefined schema files (checking type, range and converting units), and writes the results as JSON files ready for ingestion into the model database, while reporting any mismatches or missing entries.
business_intent: Enable reliable, automated migration of simulation configuration data into the central model repository for CTA telescopes, ensuring data quality and consistency across the simulation and analysis pipelines.
